name: Punishment NyanNyan
description:
"Punishment NyanNyan" is a visual novel game consisting of animation for adults.
After all his misdeeds, Seiga has finally become a rope...The villagers' "punishment" begins now!!
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
■Work introduction
A collection of slimy erotic videos sent in 30fps animation (*MP4 for mobile available)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------
■Contents
Actual scene: 6 types + OP/ED
Number of video files: 55 (with MP4 for mobile)

・Doggy Style
・Irrumatio
・Bondage
・Full Nelson
・Vibrator
・Doggy Style2 (New!)
・Ending

【basic action】

Move each scene with one click
